name: Shiju Varghese
body:
### Shiju Varghese.

Shiju Varghese is a Microsoft MVP and a Technical Architect, specializes in providing solution on Cloud and Enterprise Mobility. His current technology focus is on Windows Azure, HDInsight, HTML5/JavaScript as a Platform, Node.js and Koa.j. Shiju is passionate about building scalable Cloud apps on the Windows Azure Platform. His areas of interest include Cloud Computing, Big Data, Enterprise Mobility, Mobile Backend as a Service (MBaaS), Domain-Driven Design (DDD), Test Driven Development (TDD). Shiju is an enthusiast on Agile and Lean development practices. Shiju works as a Technical Architect at the Cloud Centre of Excellence at Marlabs.

### Connect with me.

Github repositories : https://github.com/shijuvar
 
Blog: http://weblogs.asp.net/shijuvarghese/

Twitter : https://twitter.com/shijucv/

LinkedIn : http://in.linkedin.com/in/shijuv
